newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Omega to distribute Pioneer, Telefunken.
newsitem.headline: Omega to distribute Pioneer, Telefunken.

text.p: Omega Holdings Ltd on Friday said it had reached agreement in principle with Japan's Pioneer Electronic Corp and France's Thomson Multimedia to become the sole distributor of Pioneer and Telefunken products respectively in South Africa.
Omega also reached agreement with Plessey Corp to acquire those operations belonging to Plessey which relate to the marketing and distribution of Telefunken and Pioneer products in South Africa.
The company advised shareholders to exercise caution in dealing in Omega shares and said a further announcement would be made in due course.
